title: (x) Looking for font similar to Masters Tournament logo - Bookman Swash {Linda}
content:
Hey Gang:

I assume that the typeface used in the Masters logo is custom, but does anyone have any suggestions for a common one that is close to the mark?

Thanks!

DcG

author: Snaxdzl

comments.content:
I just found a post like mine (that for some reason didn't come up last night when I searched) from a while ago and Caslon with Swash alternates.

Thanks for the tip!
